item.description: Date Time Location: Saturday November 21st 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM Description: All day seminar with Tony Sweet. Putting Fine Art into your photography. Who's organizing: Paul Smith: diffangle@aol.com Where - directions St. Andrews Church, 3 Maple St., Framingham, for directions: http://gatewaycameraclub.org/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=314&Itemid=65/ Cost and how to pay: $50 contact Paul Smith at diffangle@aol.com for ticket availability. Tony Sweet Saturday Nov. 21st 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM Appearing at Gateway Camera Club Framingham, MA www.tonysweet.com Tony will show you how to put the Fine Art into your Photography. At this all day seminar you will learn about: Light, Composition, HDR, Photoshop and Artistic Photoshop Plug Ins. Tickets in advance $50, includes lunch. Groups of 10 or more receive a 10% discount. Contact: Paul Smith at diffangle@aol.com For more info go to:

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Tony Sweet shows you how to put the Fine Art into your Photography
